グラウンドの隅から何か声が聞こえ――: I heard a voice from the corner of the grounds—

か、勘違いしないでくださいまし！\nこれは訓練の一環ですわ！: P-Please don't get the wrong idea! <b>This is part of my training!

なりふり構わず強さを求める姿勢は侮れない。\nなぜならそれこそが、『物事を成す意: I can't underestimate the way you seek strength without caring about appearances. After all, that's the power of the will to accomplish things.
これをきっかけに、化けるかもしれないぞ。: You might be able to disguise yourself with this.
諸君、おめでとう。シミュレーターの時間だ。: Congratulations, gentlemen. It's time for the simulator.
